Text:
Thanks ... but this is not HD!!

The video resolution is 624 by 352 ...

HDTV is the source. Just like DVD or BluRay for movies/TV shows. It is then down-converted for resolution or filesize.
If a file _is_ HD it is typically labelled 720 or 1080 in the filename or torrent. A big clue is the filesize would be MUCH bigger. An hour of 720p typically exceeds 2gigs. Welcome to torrents and thanks for sharing the resolution.

Eurosport couverage in SD and HD
